items.preText: 3.11pm We're set to resume. Southee with the new ball.
items.text: full just outside off, and driven away from his body to point
items.shortText: Southee to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: edged and taken! Full on off, and angling further away from the batsman. But Tamim's in no mood to hang around. Skips down the ground and try to slash a shot over cover. Finds the thick outside edge to the keeper instead
items.shortText: Southee to Tamim Iqbal, OUT

dismissal.text: Tamim Iqbal c †Latham b Southee 0 (1m 2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: yorker on leg stump, but the swing takes the ball down the leg side
items.shortText: Southee to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: full on leg stump, and tucked away - off his pads - to midwicket
items.postText: Stuart: "I'm a huge Tamim fan but that was irresponsible. When you're chasing a big score it's all about building a platform and launching later. Daft batting. "
items.shortText: Southee to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: middle stump rocked back! Great swing bowling on display. Full on off, and swinging inwards sharply. Ball jags back after hitting the deck, and Sarkar has driven down the wrong line. Stumps rattled and Southee has his second!
items.postText: Giggity: "BD looking to beat Oman's record"
items.shortText: Southee to Soumya Sarkar, OUT

items.text: length ball, wide outside off stump, and left alone by Mushfiqur
items.shortText: Southee to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he prods forward to check-drive towards cover. Excellent start for NZ
items.shortText: Southee to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off, looking for the inswing. Clipped off his toes to midwicket first up
items.shortText: Boult to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he pushes forward to drive. Splices the shot to the infielder on the off side
items.shortText: Boult to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on middle, and he puts his front leg across the delivery of the line, before whipping this away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Boult to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he drives with the bat's open face to cover
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball on leg, and Mushfiqur defends off the back foot
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball. Mistimes a drive to mid-off, but takes the single anyway
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: appeal for lbw, and given! Liton wants to review, but the umpire says he's too late to decide. Full ball drifting into leg stump. Liton misses the clip, ball stays low and hits his front leg. No hesitation from the umpire to raise his finger. Southee has his third!
items.postText: OB Jato: ""Going Down The Track to Poke at a Delivery Wide Outside Off to The Keeper, and Other Ways to Get Out in Swinging Conditions" - a bestseller written by rhe Bangladeshi batsmen, out in all bookstores now!"
items.shortText: Southee to Liton Das, OUT

dismissal.text: Liton Das lbw b Southee 1 (14m 4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 25.00

items.text: back of a length outside off, and jagging away from the deck after hitting the pitch. Left alone by the batsman
items.shortText: Southee to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length ball, wide outside off again. Mahmudullah shoulders his arms once more
items.shortText: Southee to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full on off stump, with Southee searching for the swing. Mahmudullah prods forward and defends with soft hands
items.shortText: Southee to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, and left alone by the batsman
items.shortText: Southee to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full on off stump again, and Mahmudullah defends this away to mid-off. Wicket maiden
items.shortText: Southee to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: steaming in, length ball on middle that's going away from the right-hander. Mushfiqur covers his off stump and then shoulders his arms
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off, and the ball balloons over the top of off stump! Really close with Mushfiqur offering no shot
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle stump and he looks to work a shot towards the leg side. Deceived by the inswinger and the ball hits his front leg. Muted lbw appeal, ball was going down leg
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, and going further away. The batsman tries to throw his hands at this, but can't get bat on ball
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball just outside off, and he tries to cut, but inside-edges the shot into his body
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
